TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExpandProvider

summary.span: Essa interface declara os métodos necessários para dar suporte à opção de consulta $expand para um WCF Data Services.

span.span: This interface declares the methods required to support the $expand query option for an WCF Data Services.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable ApplyExpansions(class System.Linq.IQueryable queryable, class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Data.Services.ExpandSegmentCollection> expandPaths) cil managed
Public Function ApplyExpansions (queryable As IQueryable, expandPaths As ICollection(Of ExpandSegmentCollection)) As IEnumerable

param.name: expandPaths
param.span: Uma coleção de caminhos a expandir.

span.span: A collection of paths to expand.
Applies expansions to the specified parameter.

returns.span: Um objeto do mesmo tipo que o objeto fornecido que inclui o especificado.

span.span: An object of the same type as the supplied object that includes the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método pode modificar o `expandPaths` para indicar quais expansões são incluídos.The method may modify the `expandPaths` to indicate which expansions are included. Retornado pode implementar o interface para fornecer objetos enumeráveis as expansões; caso contrário, as informações de expandido são esperadas a ser encontrado diretamente no objeto enumerado.The returned may implement the interface to provide enumerable objects for the expansions; otherwise, the expanded information is expected to be found directly in the enumerated objects.
